mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( select tps.*,d1.dealer_name as pull_storage_party_name,d1.dealer_name as pull_storage_user_name,th.hospital_name as put_storage_party_name from dms.tb_pull_storage tps LEFT JOIN tb_dealer d1 ON tps.fk_pull_storage_party_id=d1.dealer_id LEFT JOIN tb_hospital th ON tps.fk_put_storage_party_id=th.id ) t

SELECT * FROM( select tps.*,d1.dealer_name as pull_storage_party_name,d1.dealer_name as pull_storage_user_name,th.hospital_name as put_storage_party_name from dms.tb_pull_storage tps LEFT JOIN tb_dealer d1 ON tps.fk_pull_storage_party_id=d1.dealer_id LEFT JOIN tb_hospital th ON tps.fk_put_storage_party_id=th.id ) t

select LPAD(max(pull_storage_no)+1,3,0) as pull_storage_no from dms.tb_pull_storage WHERE create_date between CURDATE() AND CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') AND fk_pull_storage_party_id =#{fk_pull_storage_party_id} AND type=#{type}
SELECT pull_storage_code,SUM(sales_number) as total_number FROM tb_pull_storage_detail WHERE pull_storage_code=#{pull_storage_code}
